name: Saxx Pilot 2N1 Shorts - Men's
description: Make strides through training or race season without thinking about what to wear. These 2-in-1 ultralight running shorts have a compressive liner to support your legs through the kilometers. The 3D pouch holds everything in place and prevents chafing during hard and sweaty runs.Stretch woven outer shorts are quick to dry.Semi-compression Quest liner hugs the body without being restrictive.Wide waistband with integrated drawcord for a snug fit.Ballpark Pouch provides support and stability.Flat seams for chafe-free wear.
